title: US Inflation Unexpectedly Accelerating to a 40-Year High of 8.6%
itunes:title: US Inflation Unexpectedly Accelerating to a 40-Year High of 8.6%
description:
Bloomberg News International Economics and Policy Correspondent Michael McKee, Bloomberg News Equities Reporter Jess Menton and Neil Dutta, Head of Economic Research at Renaissance Macro Research, discuss Friday's CPI data and how inflation is impacting the economy and the markets. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Financial Investigations Senior Writer Stephanie Baker discuss Stephanie's Businessweek Magazine story 3M Risks Criminal Charges for ‘Forever Chemicals’ in Europe. Noelle Acheson, Head of Market Insights at Genesis Trading, explains why crypto correlations spike in times of market uncertainty. And we Drive to the Close with Amanda Agati, Chief Investment Officer at PNC Asset Management Group.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
